duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the development and implementation of advanced technologies to enhance the project management capabilities of software.
Partner with other product managers, engineering, and UX to develop solutions using the latest technologies to deliver key insights and capabilities to customers.
Utilize AI technologies, machine learning, and data analytics to drive intelligent automation and data-driven insights within project management software.
Solve complex challenges, make data-driven decisions, and propose innovative solutions.
Collaborate effectively with development teams to advocate for a seamless and intuitive user experience, ensuring that AI and analytics features meet customer needs.
Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in AI, analytics, and project management to drive product innovation.
Ensure data privacy and security regulations are adhered to, and data governance frameworks and standards are maintained.
Work cross-team with product owners, scrum masters, designers, and developers to drive product development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field. Knowledge of data privacy and security regulations.
